Landscape visualiser (Viewland)¶

Source code: https://github.com/andywuy/landscape_visualiser

Documentation: https://andywuy.github.io/landscape_visualiser/

Viewland is a landscape visualiser that can visualise the potential energy surface based on user provided landscape data. The program uses the disconnectivity graphs to visualise the high-dimensional landscape surfaces.

The landscape data (min.data and ts.data) can be generated by PATHSAMPLE, which is developed in Wales’ Group.

Installation¶

Install from Github

git clone https://github.com/andywuy/landscape_visualiser
cd landscape_visualiser
docker-compose up -d
docker-compose run viewland bash

Examples¶

export PYTHONPATH=/code/
cd /user_data/
python /code/scripts/gen_tree.py

The tree.pdf which displays the disconnectivity graph of the landscape will be created.
